attributes.action: NMC to provide full account of its income and outgoings and justify every expense it incurs and abide by vote of nurses on fee increases.
attributes.additional_details:
There is clear opposition to nurses' registration fee increases.

NMC should provide and justify details of their expenses to nurses.

It should explain why it cannot tighten its belt like all nurses have to.

It is hugely unfair for registration fees to rise at an exhorbitant above-inflation rate.

No to £200 or even £100 registration fee.

rejection.details: Please see - No to proposed increase in fees for Nurses and Midwives
